author: Baxtonwarls
comment: Just wear something that’s considered sporty, eg no jeans or chino pants. Also note BRING A TOWEL. You will not be able to enter without a towel. Hope this helps

author: Baxtonwarls
comment: I don’t go there too often but you can almost always find a empty rack so just go whenever you’ve got the time. It doesn’t get too crowded from my experience and I always go during lunch
